speaker: President. −
english: President. − The next item is the report [ 2007/2105(INI) ] ( A6-0336/2007 ) by Mr Florenz, on behalf of the Committee on the Environment, Public Health and Food Safety, on the Green Paper ‘Towards a Europe free from tobacco smoke: policy options at EU level’.
original: President. − The next item is the report [ 2007/2105(INI) ] ( A6-0336/2007 ) by Mr Florenz, on behalf of the Committee on the Environment, Public Health and Food Safety, on the Green Paper ‘Towards a Europe free from tobacco smoke: policy options at EU level’.
agenda_item: Tobacco smoke: policy options at EU level (debate)
